code: import React from"react";import Logo from"./Logo";import Sidebar from"./SideBar";import{useUser}from"./UserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const textStyle={width:"100px",borderRight:"1px solid rgb(221, 221, 221)",paddingRight:"10px",borderBottom:"1px solid rgb(221, 221, 221)"};const ViewOrder=()=>{const{loggedUser}=useUser();const orderList=loggedUser==null?[]:JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("order_".concat(loggedUser.username)))||[];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Logo,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{fontSize:"24px",color:"purple",textAlign:"center",borderBottom:"3px solid black"},children:"Your Orders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[orderList.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{textAlign:"center",color:"brown",fontSize:"20px"},children:"You have not placed any orders"}):null,orderList.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{style:{color:"green",fontSize:"20px",fontWeight:"bold",textAlign:"center"},children:["Your Order ",index+1," arriving on ",item[0].deliveryDate]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{style:{margin:"0 auto",border:"1px solid rgb(221, 221, 221)",borderCollapse:"collapse",padding:"10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:textStyle,children:"Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:textStyle,children:"Price"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:item.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:textStyle,children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",item.price]})]},index);})})]})]},index);})]})]});};export default ViewOrder;
